segments.text: I see the two children by the upper cabinets, plotting their move.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A young boy is precariously balanced on a two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched upward, reaching into an open cabinet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can clearly read the label "COOKIE JAR" inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He has one hand deep in the jar, no doubt grabbing a handful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl next to him has her hand raised, eagerly awaiting her share.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's not even touching the stool, but her cooperation is obvious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I notice how unstable that stool looks, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's tilting backward, so close to tipping over entirely.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The daring nature of their secret mission is quite impressive.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They are so focused on their prize, completely unaware of the dangers.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is a recipe for disaster and delight.
segments.speaker: PAR
